content.raw:
I've got an idea. Warning: it's a pretty disgusting hack.

Clone this repo: https://github.com/jonbinney/sdformat_package_xml into the same catkin workspace as sdformat (i tested this on sdformat because it is quicker to clone, but same principle should work with gazebo). It just tells catkin to build the sdformat code.
Advantages:
1. no adding package.xml to upstream
2. can put this in a .rosinstall and you don't need to do any copying of package.xml files, or whatever.
Disadvantages:
1. kind of disgusting.

Edit: i said rosinstall when i meant package.xml
